name: Madolche Teacher Glassouffle
text:
2 Level 4 "Madolche" monsters
(Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 face-up "Madolche" monster; for the rest of this turn, that monster becomes unaffected by monster effects, except its own. If a "Madolche" card(s) is sent to your GY while you control this monster: You can shuffle up to 2 cards from the GY(s) into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Madolche Teacher Glassouffle" once per turn.
